questions.question_text: Which of the following tables are included in the GRC: Policy and Compliance Management scoped application? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BDG
sn_compliance_risk does not exist.

Selected Answer: ADG
Answer:
 B. sn_compliance_policy
 D. sn_compliance_policy_statement
 G. sn_compliance_citation
Explanation: the GRC: Policy and Compliance Management contains 38 tables which includes
 - Policy[sn_compliance_policy]
 - Control objective[sn_compliance_policy_statement]
 - Citation[sn_compliance_citation]
Control/Risk[sn_grc_item], Audience to User[sn_grc_m2m_audience_user] is in the in the GRC: Profiles application, while sn_compliance_risk, sn_grc_entity_type doesn't exist as tables in SN.
Source: PDI, sys_db_object list view with filter: sys_scope.name=GRC: Policy and Compliance Management

questions.question_text: What is the Risk likelihood called when using the Quantitative method?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Likelihood - Qualitative
SLE - Single Loss Expectancy, not risk likelihood.
ARO - Annualized Rate of Occurence - Expected Annual Rate of e.g., the SLE occurring. Not risk likelihood.
Therefore Answer is B - Calculated Score
